effect.ruby_sapphire: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Destroys barriers such as REFLECT and causes damage.
flavor_text.emerald: Destroys barriers such as REFLECT and causes damage.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that also breaks any barrier like LIGHT SCREEN and REFLECT.
